#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    // freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	long int N, M;
	cin >> M >> N;
	long int A[M];
	int flag = 1;
	for(int i =0; i< M;i++)
	{
		cin >> A[i];
		if
		(A[i] > (N+1)/2)
		{
			flag = 0;
		}
	}
	if(flag)
	cout << "YES\n";
	else
	cout << "NO\n";
	
}
